title: BBC Local Live: Essex Tuesday, 26 January 2016 - BBC News
summary: new thames road tunnel would cross river east of tilbury , it is revealed .
health inspectors have published another critical report about mental health services in north essex .
news , sport , travel and weather updates resume at 08:00 on wednesday .

documents.title: our live coverage across the day
text: thanks for joining us for our live updates today .
essex live has now finished for the day , but we 'll be back tomorrow from 08:00 with the latest news , sport , travel and weather updates for the county .

documents.title: distinctive charity car stolen
text: a man from manningtree says he is devastated after a 1989 vauxhall nova that was used for a charity event was stolen .
ashley martin drove 2,000 miles across the country this weekend , raising a total of £ 6,500 for care home acorn village and children with cancer uk .
he says the car is very distinctive and would `` stand out like a sore thumb . ''
author: Charlotte Rose
BBC Essex

documents.title: weather : further outbreaks of rain
text: it 'll stay cloudy overnight with further outbreaks of rain , perhaps becoming heavy and persistent for a time .
minimum temperature : 9c ( 48f ) .
author: Kate Kinsella
BBC Look East weather

documents.title: signed beatles photo sells for £ 5,000
text: a signed photograph of the beatles has sold for £ 5,000 at an auction in southend .
stacey 's auctioneers in rayleigh said the photo was signed when the band appeared in the town in 1963 .
it was bought by an online buyer in switzerland for more than double the amount it was estimated to sell at .
author: Charlotte Rose
BBC Essex

documents.title: stolen puppy 's owner steps up security
text: the owner of a stolen puppy worth at least £ 1,000 says she will be increasing security at her home in west horndon .

the nine-week-old maltese terrier puppy called pickle was taken from adele rowley 's kitchen yesterday during a burglary , in which her car was also stolen but her other dog - a three-year-old maltese terrier - was left behind.she said : `` i 've only had pickle a week but have grown really attached to her .
my other dog is missing her too - her tail has been down since she was taken . ''
author: Robby West
BBC Essex

documents.title: power firm fined over £ 1m after runner electrocuted
text: a power company has been ordered to pay more than £ 1m after a runner was electrocuted on a footpath in north essex .
james kew , 41 , died in july 2012 after coming into contact with an 11,000-volt cable which had come down in a field at debden road , newport .
uk power networks , which admitted breaching health and safety law at chelmsford crown court , was today fined £ 1m and told to pay costs of over £ 150,000 .
author: Ian Puckey
BBC Essex

documents.title: extra medical checks for airshow pilots
text: clacton airshow display pilots will face extra medical checks under new rules announced by the civil aviation to tighten safety after the shoreham air crash .

there were discussions over whether to cancel the event last year , which went ahead shortly after the accident.organisers will also have to complete stricter risk assessments that could see some shows near busy roads cancelled .
author: Gavin Fischer
BBC Essex

documents.title: braintree town 's pitch looking good
text: officials say the pitch at braintree town has `` dried out nicely '' but will be checked ahead of tonight 's clash with wrexham .
the game is set to be the iron 's first home league game since november 28 - when they drew 0-0 with torquay .
danny cowley 's team head into the game on the back of four defeats .
author: Tom Croasdell
BBC Essex

documents.title: travel : part of m25 closed until tomorrow
text: two lanes of the m25 will be closed for the rest of today following an earlier road traffic collision .
highways england says the road will be closed anti-clockwise between j29 at upminster and j28 at brentwood for emergency resurfacing .
the carriageway is not expected to fully reopen until 05:30 tomorrow .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: man arrested following stabbing
text: a 59-year-old man has been arrested following a stabbing in clacton .
police were called to groom park at about 12:15 where they found a man in his 30s with puncture wounds to his shoulder and hand .
his injuries are not thought to be life-threatening .
author: Ian Puckey
BBC Essex

documents.title: sunrise captured by weather watchers
text: weather watchers have captured the sunrise in essex this morning .
author: Jack Warren
BBC Local Live

documents.title: kevin maher happy to stay in charge of chelmsford city
text: kevin maher says he 's happy to carry on in charge of chelmsford city for as long as the chairman wants him there .
the southend united youth coach took temporary charge last week following mark hawkes ' departure .
maher ( more than 450 appearances for the shrimpers in his playing career .
author: Tom Croasdell
BBC Essex

documents.title: weather : rain will become heavy this afternoon
text: outbreaks of rain will spread from the west throughout this afternoon , eventually becoming persistent and heavy.although it will be another mild day , it will also become very windy .
maximum temperature : 10c ( 50f ) .
author: Kate Kinsella
BBC Look East weather

documents.title: new tunnel could cost up to £ 5bn
text: new plans for a multi-billion pound road tunnel under the river thames between kent and essex are designed to ease congestion , with 140,000 vehicles a day using the existing crossing .
it could cost up to £ 5bn and the option that highways england has chosen is the most expensive .
if approved , it will pass through undeveloped green belt land , ancient woodland and the thames marshes .
author: Simon Dedman
BBC Essex

documents.title: missing basildon teenager found
text: missing girl megan love has been found this afternoon in basildon , police say .
the 16-year-old had been missing from her home in the town since 00:30 on monday .
author: Charlie Jones
BBC Local Live

documents.title: headlines : tunnel plans unveiled mental health trust criticised
text: headlines : tunnel plans unveiled mental health trust criticised
author: Charlotte Rose
BBC Essex

documents.title: public exhibitions to be held over new tunnel
text: highways england says there will be 24 public exhibitions , held at venues across kent and essex , about plans to build a new tunnel .
it will be the first new crossing of the thames east of london since the queen elizabeth ii bridge opened at dartford 25 years ago .
you can give your views by clicking here .
author: Simon Dedman
BBC Essex

documents.title: travel : m25 problems
text: drivers are warned to expect long delays with two lanes closed on the m25 between the turn-offs for basildon and chelmsford .
highways england
highwayseast
1 lane has re-opened on the # m25 a/clock btwn j29 # basildon- j28 # chelmsford .
2 lanes remain closed .
long delays
1 lane has re-opened on the # m25 a/clock btwn j29 # basildon- j28 # chelmsford .
2 lanes remain closed .
long delays
author: BBC Essex

documents.title: puppy stolen during burglary
text: a woman from west horndon has spoken of her distress after her car and her nine-week old puppy were stolen during a burglary yesterday .
pickle , a white maltese terrier , and a black range rover sport were stolen from adele rowley 's house on petresfield way .
ms rowley said : `` i just ca n't understand why someone would take pickle and need to know she is being fed and looked after . ''

documents.title: differences of opinion on new multi-billion pound tunnel plan
text: a new multi-billion pound road link across the river thames between essex and kent could contribute more than £ 7bn to the economy , according to roads minister andrew jones .
however , the labour leader of thurrock council , john kent , said he would be fighting `` tooth and nail '' against plans to build the new lower thames crossing within the borough .
he said it was a worrying time for local residents .
author: Simon Dedman
BBC Essex

documents.title: residents concerned over impact of tunnel
text: hundreds of people turned up to a public meeting in thurrock about the new lower thames crossing last night .
highways england has announced that it wants to build a tunnel that would affect the tilbury area .
it says it would `` unlock massive economic benefits '' and relieve congestion , but many local residents expressed concern over the likely disruption to the area .
author: Simon Dedman
BBC Essex

documents.title: new tunnel proposed to link kent and essex
text: proposals for a new multi-billion pound tunnel across the river thames between essex and kent have been announced by highways england .
the new road link - which would cross the river just east of gravesend in kent and tilbury in essex - has been designed to relieve congestion at the dartford crossing .
an option to build a bridge adjacent to the existing crossing has been ruled out .
a consultation starts today and runs until 24 march .
author: Simon Dedman
BBC Essex

documents.title: mental health trust has rise in unexpected deaths
text: a mental health trust which has been criticised over patient safety after an inspection , has experienced a rise in serious incidents and unexpected deaths , along with several other trusts .
the north essex partnership nhs foundation trust reported 31 unexpected deaths in 2013/14 and 51 in 2014/15 , while serious incidents went up from 51 to 79 .

melanie leahy , whose son matthew leahy was found hanged in his room at the linden centre in chelmsford in november 2012 , said : `` if things had been actioned sooner then others would not have died by the same means . ''
author: Richard Smith
BBC Essex

documents.title: police concerned over missing girl
text: essex police say they 're concerned for the welfare of a 16-year-old girl , missing from her home in basildon .
megan love was last seen in the early hours of yesterday .
she 's described as white , and with very long red hair .
author: Charlie Jones
BBC Local Live

documents.title: mother of mental health patient criticises 'very soft ' report
text: the mother of a 20-year-old man who died at a mental health centre after staff `` missed opportunities '' to provide better care , has criticised a report into the trust that cared for him .

melanie leahy , whose son matthew leahy was found hanged in his room at the linden centre in chelmsford on 15 november 2012 , said the report , which raises concerns over safety , did not go far enough and `` is very soft '' .
andrew geldard , chief executive , north essex partnership nhs foundation trust , said many changes had already been made .
author: Richard Smith
BBC Essex

documents.title: arrest following armed robbery
text: a 29-year-old man has been arrested following an armed robbery at a shop in chelmsford .
the robbery happened at the co-op store in forest drive last night , where a knife was recovered .
the chelmsford man is now being questioned on sus of robbery .
author: Nick Alliker
BBC Essex

documents.title: shock over firm 's use of wristbands for asylum seekers
text: a migrants ' campaign group says it 's shocked that an essex-based company was using red wristbands to identify asylum seekers so they could receive food .
the firm clearsprings , based in rayleigh , was operating the scheme at a hostel in cardiff , but has now abandoned the idea after it was criticised by ministers .
rita chadha from the refugee and migrant forum of essex and london said the scheme was `` staggeringly stigmatising '' for asylum seekers .
author: Nick Alliker
BBC Essex

documents.title: nhs trust boss defends record on patient safety
text: inspectors have called for changes to the mental health services provided by the north essex partnership nhs foundation trust , including amending doors to prevent patients from hanging themselves .
but the trust 's boss says that many changes have already been made .
we have targeted a number of issues in a number of bedrooms .
we have invested something in the region of £ 30m to £ 40m in updating our facilities . ''
author: Laura Safe
BBC Essex

documents.title: health inspectors concerned over patient safety
text: a health watchdog has raised concerns about a mental health trust in essex following an inspection .

the care quality commission said the safety of the services provided by the north essex partnership nhs foundation trust must be improved , adding that it was the second consecutive report to flag up problems that have still not been fixed .
however , trust chief executive andrew geldard has insisted that he is taking action .
author: Laura Safe
BBC Essex

documents.title: weather : rain on the way
text: it will be a dry morning with some brightness , but cloud and outbreaks of rain will spread from the west after midday .
it will be mild to start but will become very windy .
maximum temperature : 10c ( 50f ) .
author: Kate Kinsella
BBC Look East weather

documents.title: headlines : mental health services criticised company defends use of wristbands for asylum seekers
text: here are this morning 's headlines :
author: Nick Alliker
BBC Essex

documents.title: welcome to tuesday 's live page
text: we 'll be bringing you all the latest news , sport , travel and weather throughout the day until 18:00 .
share your views and via email , twitter or facebook .
author: Charlie Jones
BBC Local Live
